snippet.title: Swift: Firebase 3 - How to Build a Login Page Using iOS9 Constraint Anchors (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Much awaited, anticipated, and requested video series on how to use Firebase is now here.  Today, we'll briefly go through what the application does in terms of chat functionality. We will then dive right into Xcode and create a new project, and build our login page using iOS 9 constraint anchors.  Stay tuned for the next episode where we'll look at how to install the Firebase SDK and save our users into the real time database.  

iOS Basic Training Course:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/basic-training

Completed Source Code
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/Firebase-Chat-Messenger

Follow me on Twitter: https://twitter.com/buildthatapp
